Description:
KEY RESPONSIBILTIESFollow the priorities set by the site engineer, define the number of required crews/workers and their specialties to do the job, assign tasks and set timeframes for each activity in order to meet scheduled deadlines.
Assess the need for materials, tools and equipment and inform the site engineer to ensure their availability on time.
Make sure that tools and equipment are in a good condition at all time, take the necessary measures to prevent damage, deterioration or loss, thus decreasing indirect construction cost.
Review with each foreman the work of gang leaders/workers/subcontractors, evaluate operational outcomes, intervene whenever deemed necessary and give the necessary instructions in order to meet the job specific requirements, quality and timeframe.
Assess work efficiency and provide foremen with technical assistance and recommendations regarding the methodology that should be applied in order to perform work efficiently while cutting down time and effort.
Monitor the performance of trade workers and conduct the performance appraisal of subordinates and intervene in case of fluctuations in order to keep a high efficiency level.
Assist the site engineer in evaluating the productivity rate, provide him with the necessary recommendations that aim to optimize the rate.
Solve regular problems and escalate critical ones while providing the necessary support to solve them and prevent work interruptions.
Promote safety policies and procedures and check on their proper implementation; take appropriate measures to ensure on-site compliance to safety regulations.
Coordinate with timekeeper regarding the working hours and overtimes of gang leaders/workers under his supervision in order to ensure accuracy of time attendance data.
Maintain a healthy work climate and coordinate with the concerned persons to prevent functional conflicts between different construction crews.
Maintain and update on-site documentation in a way to keep track of relevant daily activities.
Coach subordinates in order to integrate them in the work and train them to ensure their continuous skills level improvement.Skills
Skills:
Technical Diploma with a minimum of 5 years of experience.
Strong communication, analytical and supervisory skills.
Basic apprehension and comprehension in Arabic and English reading, writing and speaking.
Proficiency in manipulating AutoCAD and MS Office.
Strong communication, critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
High level of team building skills.
